scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const dirs = ['api/public/assets', 'api/public/css', 'api/public/js']; dirs.forEach(dir => { if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) fs.mkdirSync(dir, { recursive: true }); }); try { if (process.platform === 'win32') { execSync('xcopy /E /I /Y api\\css\\* api\\public\\css\\'); execSync('xcopy /E /I /Y api\\js\\* api\\public\\js\\'); execSync('xcopy /E /I /Y api\\assets\\* api\\public\\assets\\'); } else { execSync('cp -R api/css/* api/public/css/'); execSync('cp -R api/js/* api/public/js/'); execSync('cp -R api/assets/* api/public/assets/'); } console.log('Files copied successfully'); } catch (err) { console.error('Error copying files:', err); } console.log('Build completed');"
